title: Across the Universe
creator_credit: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
brief_description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

creator_credit_for_label: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, a rich but sheltered American girl who joins the growing anti-war movement in New York’s Greenwich Village. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
description_for_label: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
